body:
Comment 2 by **rounin.urashima**: 
Hello, 
I updated to a newer tip:


pkg/net/url
pkg/text/template/parse
pkg/text/template
pkg/go/doc
pkg/go/build
cmd/go
./make.bash: line 151:  3584 Illegal instruction     "$GOTOOLDIR"/go_bootstrap clean -i
std

real	130m28.415s
user	47m27.520s
sys	7m36.010s
rounin@LKG:~/go/src$ hg identify
f57908289898 tip
